ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:23:13 [Issue ID 4000-696852] urn:comicvine:4000-696852 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 22:13:17. [Issue ID 1914101]
ComicInfo.Summary:
While Merlin and Mordred fight an all-out war that will determine the fate of Camelot and possibly the world itself, Skye and Shang try to find a way to stop them and destroy the all-powerful Grail. Don't miss this special anniversary issue whose outcome will change the fate of the Grimm Universe forever!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Caanan White & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Mike Krome & Hedwin Zaldivar | 3 | D | Cover D | Anthony Spay & Grostieta | 4 | E | Cover E | Jay Anacleto & Ula Mos | 5 | F | Connecting Cover F (Part 1 of 2) | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 6 | G | Connecting Cover G (Part 2 of 2) | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 7 | H | Cover H | Mike Krome & Hedwin Zaldivar | 8 | I | Zenescope Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 750 | Geebo Vigonte (a) & Ivan Nunes (c) | Missing | J | Zenescope Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Keith Garvey | Missing |
